projects.name: Grace Shopper Records
projects.description: Grace Shopper Records is an E-Commerce website built using the Spotify API to represent vinyl records to be sold. Both user and administrator experiences are built in.

projects.name: Linkuistix
projects.description: A word association game built upon a pre-trained AI model, Linkuistix is a battle against the clock that challenges players to find related words as quickly as they can.
